description:
Provides an ONS group resource.

For more information about how to use it, see [RocketMQ Group Management API](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/29616.html). 

-> **NOTE:** Available in 1.53.0+

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

GroupId.description: Name of the group. Two groups on a single instance cannot have the same name. A `group_id` starts with "GID_" or "GID-", and contains letters, numbers, hyphens (-), and underscores (_).

InstanceId.description: ID of the ONS Instance that owns the groups.

ReadEnable.description: This attribute is used to set the message reading enabled or disabled. It can only be set after the group is used by the client.

Remark.description: This attribute is a concise description of group. The length cannot exceed 256.
